answerText: rhinovirus[10] Rhinoviruses commonly use this mode of viral propagation, in which new virions burst out of a dying host cell. This process is contrasted with the lysogenic cycle.
heading: 2012 Penn-ance |2012 | 2 | 9 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This virus enters epithelial cells by binding to CD54, and its capsid is formed by VP1 through 4. For 10 points each: [10] Name this single-stranded RNA virus responsible for causing the common cold. Pleconaril is the only real treatment for this enterovirus.
